{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
import os 
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
path_data = '../data/ISRIC_report_2008_02_csv/'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
os.listdir(path_data)

['WISE3_LABcodes_Description.csv',
 'WISE3_HORIZON.csv',
 'WISE3_coding_conventions.csv',
 'WISE3__ReadMeFirst.csv',
 'WISE3_LABname.csv',
 'WISE3_LABname_codes.csv',
 'WISE3_SITE.csv',
 'WISE3_SOURCE.csv']
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
site = pd.read_csv(f'{path_data}/WISE3_SITE.csv')
horizon = pd.read_csv(f'{path_data}/WISE3_HORIZON.csv')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
cols = [
        "WISE3_ID",  # Unique ID for soil in question (ISO code + number)
        "HONU",  #  sequential horizon number
        "DESIG",  # horizon designation code
        "TOPDEP",  # upper depth of horizon (cm)
        "BOTDEP",  # bottom depth of horizon (cm)
        "ORGC",  # organic carbon content (g kg^-1)
        "BULKDENS",  # bulk density (g cm^-3)
        "LONDD",  # longitude
        "LATDD",  # latitude
        "LONLAT_ACC",  # accuracy of location
    ]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
profile = horizon.merge(site, how='inner', left_on='WISE3_ID', right_on='WISE3_id')
profile = profile[cols]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
profile = profile.copy()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
depth = 100.
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
profile["BOTDEP_trunc"] = profile["BOTDEP"].clip(upper=depth)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
profile["segment_length"] = profile["BOTDEP_trunc"] - profile["TOPDEP"]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
profile = profile[profile.BULKDENS.notnull() & profile.segment_length.gt(0)]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
profile

13597 rows × 12 columns

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
profile["carbon_stock"] = 10 * profile["ORGC"] * profile["BULKDENS"] * profile["segment_length"]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
profile.groupby(by=["WISE3_ID", "LONDD", "LATDD", "LONLAT_ACC"]).agg({'carbon_stock': sum, 'segment_length': sum}).reset_index()
